functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to find events on the website, I want to easily filter them by age group, so I can quickly find relevant events to attend.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website and the Wild Apricot app.
functional_jobs.pain_points: The website lacks organization and filtering options for events based on age group.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A more organized event listing with filtering options to quickly identify suitable events.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to find relevant events without scrolling through unrelated options.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I use the event listing, I want to feel included in the community, so I can enjoy social interactions with people in my age group.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app to find events.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feeling excluded from events that are not targeted towards my age group.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A sense of belonging and inclusion in events that match my interests and age.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Participating in events that resonate with my demographic and interests.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be perceived as an active and engaged member of the community, so I can build connections and friendships.
social_jobs.current_solution: Attending events that I find suitable through the app.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in finding events that match my age, which could affect my participation.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Being seen as an involved and socially active member of my community.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Building social connections and being involved in community activities.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I sign up for events, I want the process to be seamless, so I can quickly secure my spot without any hassle.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Using the app to sign up for events.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Potential delays or complications in the signup process if the app or website has issues.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Quick and easy registration for events without complications.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Completing event registration successfully and effortlessly.
